 main is main of course. Nothing special... Oh! It is forced to use global variables due to poor openCV GUI functions :-((( accepts options a or h in alternative. 'a' forces the display of all images. 'h' gives the help message!

Detailed Description

Standalone application that uses the joinimg library and illustrates interactively how 2 images can be merged including distortion effects from perspective or camera lens.

Function Documentation

void ForceTrackbarsPositions (  int  bar  ) 
 

Forces bars positions and allows syncronazation of left and right bars. Uses global variables :-( Not recommended.

Parameters:
bar: if -1 forces allbars at onece. Other vales force only that bar...

) 
 

main is main of course. Nothing special... Oh! It is forced to use global variables due to poor openCV GUI functions :-((( accepts options a or h in alternative. 'a' forces the display of all images. 'h' gives the help message!
